survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Car-Sharing Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences, satisfaction levels, and barriers related to car-sharing services to improve service offerings and user experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use car-sharing services?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to measure usage frequency clearly.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use car-sharing services?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which factors are most important to you when choosing a car-sharing service? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple factors. Consider randomizing options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: Which factors are most important to you when choosing a car-sharing service? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1.

questions.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to use car-sharing services more often?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who answered 'A few times a year' or 'Never' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended format to capture detailed feedback. Clarify that responses are optional.

script.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to use car-sharing services more often?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who answered 'A few times a year' or 'Never' to Q1.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the pricing of car-sharing services?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure options are balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the pricing of car-sharing services?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1.

questions.question_text: Would you recommend car-sharing services to others?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a simple single-choice format for clarity. Include a neutral option ('Maybe').
